name: How to Survive Restructuring
author: Seon Ju Woo
content: The moment the company receives notice of a person subject to restructuring, With a roaring sound as if the sky had collapsed. And the world has changed. [The sale of this district has been decided.] [This will result in a workforce restructuring.] Restructuring for Lives Missions that you can capture to gain special powers If it&#039s a miraculous prank, I&#039ll do my best for it! &quotI found it. A way to live together.&quot Restructuring candidate Lee Eunho&#039s super-fast promotion starts
